info.title: Zoho Analytics API
info.description: API for managing data in Zoho Analytics workspaces and views.

tags.name: Metadata APIs
tags.description: Metadata APIs are used to fetch information about the reporting Workspaces, tables, reports, and dashboards created in Zoho Analytics.

get.description: Retrieve a list of organizations accessible by the authenticated user.
Retrieve a list of all workspaces accessible by the authenticated user.
Retrieve a list of workspaces owned by the authenticated user.
Retrieve a list of workspaces shared with the authenticated user.
Returns list of recently accessed views.
Returns list of all views available in trash for the specified workspace.
Returns list of all accessible dashboards.

parameters.name: CONFIG
parameters.description: JSON object with keys like 'withInvolvedMetaInfo'. Needs to be stringified and URL-encoded.

parameters.name: CONFIG
parameters.description: Stringified and URL-encoded JSON object containing 'viewIds'.

200.description: ZIP file containing exported template data

get.description: Returns list of all formula columns for the specified table.
Returns list of all aggregate formulas for the specified table.
Returns list of all aggregate formulas for the specified workspace.
Returns list of all dependent views and formulas for the specified aggregate formula.

parameters.name: formula-id
parameters.description: The ID of the aggregate formula.

get.description: Returns the value of the aggregate formula.

parameters.name: formula-id
parameters.description: The ID of the aggregate formula.

get.description: Returns details of the specified workspace or view.
Returns list of email schedules available in the specified workspace.
Fetches datasources for the specified view.
Returns details of the last data import for the specified view.

post.description: Triggers a manual data sync for the specified view's datasource.
Refetches data from the source for the specified view.

put.description: Updates the datasource connection details for the specified view.

CONFIG.description: Stringified JSON containing datasource connection config

post.description: Enable workspace access for a specified white label domain.

delete.description: Disable workspace access for the specified white label domain.

org-id.name: ZANALYTICS-ORGID
org-id.description: Organization ID (can be obtained using Get Organizations API).

scopes.ZohoAnalytics.metadata.read: Read metadata resource from Zoho Analytics.
scopes.ZohoAnalytics.metadata.delete: Delete metadata resource from Zoho Analytics.
scopes.ZohoAnalytics.metadata.update: Update metadata resource in Zoho Analytics.
scopes.ZohoAnalytics.metadata.create: Create metadata resource in Zoho Analytics.
scopes.ZohoAnalytics.metadata.all: Full access to metadata in Zoho Analytics.
scopes.ZohoAnalytics.fullaccess.all: Full access to all Zoho Analytics features.

ownedViews.viewDesc: Dashboard capturing the  highlights of closed revenue

views.viewDesc: Dashboard capturing the  highlights of closed revenue
